@@ -1,2879 +0,0 @@
-class Lead:%0A    def __init__(self, thickness: float, hardness: str, size: int):%0A        self.thickness = thickness%0A        self.hardness = hardness%0A        self.size = size%0A%0A    def usagePerSheet(self) -%3E int:%0A        %22%22%22Retorna o desgaste do grafite por folha de acordo com a dureza.%22%22%22%0A        desgaste = %7B%0A            %22HB%22: 1,%0A            %222B%22: 2,%0A            %224B%22: 4,%0A            %226B%22: 6%0A        %7D%0A        return desgaste.get(self.hardness, 1)%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return f%22%5B%7Bself.thickness%7D:%7Bself.hardness%7D:%7Bself.size%7D%5D%22%0A%0A%0Aclass Lapiseira:%0A    def __init__(self, thickness: float):%0A        self.thickness: float = thickness%0A        self.bico: Lead %7C None = None%0A        self.tambor: list%5BLead%5D = %5B%5D   #grafite no tambor%0A%0A    #ver se %C3%A9 compativel%0A    def insert(self, lead: Lead):%0A        if abs(lead.thickness - self.thickness) %3E 1e-6:%0A            print(%22fail: calibre incompativel%22)%0A            return%0A        self.tambor.append(lead)   #Adiciona grafite no final%0A%0A    def remove(self):%0A%0A        if self.bico is None:%0A            print(%22fail: nao existe bico%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.bico = None #Remove o grafite do bico%0A%0A    def writePage(self):%0A%0A        if self.bico is None:%0A            print(%22fail: nao existe no bico%22)%0A            return%0A        %0A        if self.bico.size %3C= 10:%0A            print(%22fail: tamanho insuficiente%22)%0A            self.bico = None   #retira o grafite unutiu%0A            return%0A        %0A        desgaste = self.bico.usagePerSheet()%0A%0A        if self.bico.size - desgaste %3C 10:%0A            self.tip.size = 10%0A            print(%22fail: folha incompleta%22)%0A            self.bico = 10     #maximo do grafite%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.tip.size -= desgaste  #desgasta o grafite%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A%0A        grafite_bico_str = str(self.bico) if self.bico else %22null%22%0A        grafites_tambor_str_list = %5Bstr(g) for g in self.tambor%5D%0A        grafite_tambor_str = %22%5B%22 + %22, %22.join(grafites_tambor_str_list) + %22%5D%22%0A%0A        return f%22calibre: %7Bself.thickness%7D, bico: %7Bgrafite_str%7D, tambor: %7Bgrafite_tambor_str%7D%22%0A%0A%0Adef main():%0A    lapiseira = Lapiseira()%0A%0A    while True:%0A%0A        line = input()%0A        print(%22$%22 + line)%0A        args = line.split()%0A%0A        if not args:%0A            continue%0A%0A        cmd = args%5B0%5D%0A%0A        if cmd == %22end%22:%0A            break%0A        elif cmd == %22init%22:%0A            lapiseira = Lapiseira (float(args%5B1%5D))%0A        elif cmd == %22insert%22:%0A            thickness = float(args%5B1%5D)%0A            hardness = args%5B2%5D%0A            size = int(args%5B3%5D)%0A            lead = Lead(thickness, hardness, size)%0A            lapiseira.insert(lead)%0A        elif cmd == %22remove%22:%0A            lapiseira.remove()%0A        elif cmd == %22write%22:%0A            lapiseira.writePage()%0A        elif cmd == %22show%22:%0A            print(lapiseira)%0A        else:%0A            print(%22fail: comando invalido%22)%0A%0A%0Amain()%0A
